name: Hush - Silent and Deadly
text: While Hush is not adjacent to any character, whenever he stuns an exhausted character, KO that character.

name: Espionage
text: Terraform|When you flip Espionage, it gains target opposing location's power while Espionage remains face up.

name: At Your Service
text: To play, discard a Gotham Knights character card.|Search your deck for a card with the word "Batman" in its name, identity, or text. Reveal that card and put it into your hand.

name: Brainiac 13 - Mental Giant
text: Backup: Activate >>> Target character gets -1 DEF this turn for each ongoing plot twist you control. Use only during the build phase.

name: Flying High
text: Play only if you control a Team Superman defender.|Remove from the game all attackers and equipment equipped to them, then return them to play equipped with the same equipment.

name: Teen Supremes
text: To play, exhaust X Teen Titans characters you control.|Ready target character with cost X or less.

name: Super-Town
text: Cosmic New Gods characters you control all have Cosmicâ€”Surge.

name: I'm Back Poozers!
text: Recover target stunned Green Lantern character you control with cost less than the total willpower of characters you control.

name: Thank Granny Goodness
text: Play only if you control a Darkseid's Elite character.|Turn all resources target opponent controls face down.

name: Parallax - Embodiment of Fear
text: Whenever a character with cost 5 or less becomes stunned, KO it.

name: Ring of the Sinestro Corps
text: Equip only to an Sinestro Corps character.|Equipped character gets +2/+2 and has flight and range.|At the start of the recovery phase, KO equipped character.

name: There is no Escape
text: Ongoing: Whenever an Army Manhunter character you control becomes stunned, you may put a copy of that card from your resource row into your front row.

name: Guy Gardner - Hero with Attitude
text: Reservist|Willpower 4|Activate >>> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. Use only if you control four or fewer resources.

name: Royal Flush Gang - Full House
text: A deck can have up to five cards named Royal Flush Gang.|When Royal Flush Gang enters play, all Royal Flush Gangs you control get +1 ATK this turn.

name: Bring It On!
text: Target JLA defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each opposing character.

name: Alan Scott - Golden Age Engineer
text: Alan Scott enters play exhausted.|Activate >>> Recover and ready target stunned JSA character you control.

name: Jared Stevens <> Fate - Mystic Defender
text: Pay X resource points >>> KO target unique equipment with cost X.|Magic plot twists cost you 1 less to play.

name: Agility
text: Target Secret Society character gets +2 DEF this attack.|At the start of the recover phase, if Agility is in your KO'd pile, you may KO a character you control. If you do, return agility to your hand.

name: Swiss Headquarters
text: Activate, Exhaust a non-Army Checkmate character you control >>> Recover target Army Checkmate character you control at the start of the recovery phase this turn.

name: Atomic Axe
text: Play only during the recovery phase.|KO target non-stunned character that was stunned this turn by a Future Foes character you controlled.

name: Too Ordinary
text: To play, remove two cosmic counters from characters you control.|Target character attacking a Legionnaires character you control can't cause breakthrough or ready this turn.

name: Eradicator - Spirit of Krypton
text: When Eradicator team attacks, you may ready all other attackers. If you do, they can't attack again this turn.

name: Superman/Batman Robot - Supa-Mecha-Bat
text: Dual Loyalty|Boost X: Superman/Batman Robot enters play with two +1 / +1 counters for each resource point you paid for X.

name: Roshambo
text: Insanity: Play rock, paper, scissors against an opponent. If you win, exhaust a character that opponent controls and play again.
Negate target recruit effect with cost 2 or less.

name: A Clash of Worlds
text: Name a character.|Character cards with that name are non-unique this turn.

name: Origin Story
text: To play, return a character you control to its owner's hand.|Search your deck for a card with the same name as that character, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
